Master of Science Early Childhood Education

Shaw University

Raleigh, North Carolina

Tuition $19,074

Degree Master

Accreditation NCATE

Modality On-campus

About Program

Program Details

Admissions

The Department of Education and Child Development offers the Master of Science in Early Childhood Education. The program of study provides a planned, cohesive sequence of advanced study courses that are a logical extension of coursework pursued at the undergraduate level. Graduates of the program have gone on to develop distinguished careers as master teachers, school administrators, and leaders in the field of early childhood education.

In-State Tuition: $19,074

Out of State Tuition: $19,074

Credits: 33

Completion: 24 months

GPA: 3.0

Letter of Recommendation: 2

Essay Required: Check with University

Test Required: Check with University

You're on your way!

Master of Divinity

Shaw University

Raleigh, North Carolina

Tuition $45,084

Degree Master

Modality On-campus

About Program

Program Details

Admissions

The master of divinity degree (M.Div.) prepares students for full-time ministry and/or ministerial ordination or licensure. The program enables students to use their vision and vocation to make an impact in their congregations, their communities and the world. The M.Div. program builds a strong foundation in: knowledge of the Bible; understanding of exegesis, hermeneutics and homiletics; theology; the history of the Christian church and denominations; Christian culture; spiritual and ethical formation; pastoral care; and the philosophy and psychology of preaching. The program is designed to be completed in three years of full-time study.

In-State Tuition: $45,084

Out of State Tuition: $45,084

Credits: 78

Completion: 36 months

GPA: Check with University

Letter of Recommendation: 2

Essay Required: Check with University

Test Required: Check with University

You're on your way!

Master of Arts in Christian Education

Shaw University

Raleigh, North Carolina

Tuition $29,478

Degree Master

Modality On-campus

About Program

Program Details

Admissions

The master of arts in Christian education (MACE) is designed to be completed in two years of full-time study. Students who earn a MACE degree will be equipped to educate and mobilize men and women to follow God’s call on their lives. The program builds a strong foundation of knowledge of the Bible, the history and heritage of the Christian church, Christian culture, spiritual and ethical formation, and the philosophy, psychology, teaching and administration of Christian education.

In-State Tuition: $29,478

Out of State Tuition: $29,478

Credits: 51

Completion: 24 months

GPA: Check with University

Letter of Recommendation: 2

Essay Required: Check with University

Test Required: Check with University

Bachelor of Social Work

Shaw University

Raleigh, North Carolina

Tuition $59,532

Degree Bachelor

Accreditation CSWE

Modality On-campus

About Program

Program Details

Admissions

The bachelor of social work degree prepares students to become 21st-century, critical thinkers and problem solvers, ready to meet the challenges of our global society. Our goal is to equip students with a solid foundation in theory, knowledge, values and direct practice experience in social work, community involvement, social justice, victims' rights. Students will develop skills in critical thinking, research, and writing.

In-State Tuition: $59,532

Out of State Tuition: $59,532

Credits: 121

Completion: 48 months

GPA: 2.0

Letter of Recommendation: Check with University

Essay Required: Check with University

Test Required: Check with University

Raleigh, North Carolina

Tuition $60,024

Modality On-campus

About Program

Program Details

Admissions

Shaw University offers a bachelor of science in recreation management. Students who earn the bachelor of science in recreation management degree develop essential professional skills necessary for implementing recreation programs in community agencies, schools, recreation agencies, fitness centers.

Bachelor of Science in Exercise Science

Pre-athletic Training

Shaw University

Raleigh, North Carolina

Tuition $59,040

Degree Bachelor

Modality On-campus

About Program

Program Details

Admissions

The bachelor of science degree in exercise science with a concentration in pre-athletic training is designed to provide students with the knowledge and skills to enter into corporate fitness centers, health clubs, sports medicine clinics, cardiac rehabilitation programs, sports training facilities or other programs that require exercise testing and prescription. Exercise Science is the systematic study of the mechanisms underlying human movement exercise, and physical activity. This encompasses aspects from the disciplines of human anatomy, physiology, neuroscience, psychology, motor control and biomechanics. An individual studying exercise science should have a strong interest in applying scientific principles to a variety of human movement, exercise, and physical activity settings.

In-State Tuition: $59,040

Out of State Tuition: $59,040

Credits: 120

Completion: 48 months

GPA: 2.0

Letter of Recommendation: Check with University

Essay Required: Check with University

Test Required: Check with University

Bachelor of Science in Exercise Science

Fitness & Wellness

Shaw University

Raleigh, North Carolina

Tuition $59,532

Degree Bachelor

Modality On-campus

About Program

Program Details

Admissions

The bachelor of science degree in exercise science with a concentration in fitness and wellness is designed to provide students with the knowledge and skills to enter into the health and wellness industry. Exercise Science is the systematic study of the mechanisms underlying human movement exercise, and physical activity. This encompasses aspects from the disciplines of human anatomy, physiology, neuroscience, psychology, motor control and biomechanics. An individual studying exercise science should have a strong interest in applying scientific principles to a variety of human movement, exercise and physical activity settings. Students will develop skills in critical thinking, research, and writing.

In-State Tuition: $59,532

Out of State Tuition: $59,532

Credits: 121

Completion: 48 months

GPA: 2.0

Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

Shaw University

Raleigh, North Carolina

Tuition $59,040

Degree Bachelor

Modality On-campus

About Program

Program Details

Admissions

Shaw University offers a bachelor of science in computer science. Students who earn the bachelor of science in computer science will be exposed to essential areas of the field, including software, networking, hardware and operating systems, parallel and distributed computing, theory of computing and computer graphics. The program will prepare students to pursue a career or graduate study in software development, computational science, networking and electronic commerce.

In-State Tuition: $59,040

Out of State Tuition: $59,040

Credits: 120

Completion: 48 months

GPA: 2.0

Bachelor of Science in Computer Information Systems

Shaw University

Raleigh, North Carolina

Tuition $61,992

Degree Bachelor

Modality On-campus

About Program

Program Details

Admissions

Shaw University offers a bachelor of science in computer information systems. Our degree is designed to provide students with the technological expertise they will need to excel in today’s digital world. Many of the fastest-growing and best-paying jobs are directly related to computers and software, and the program creates graduates who will be competitive and successful in these highly desirable careers.

In-State Tuition: $61,992

Out of State Tuition: $61,992

Bachelor of Science in Business Administration

Management

Shaw University

Raleigh, North Carolina

Tuition $59,532

Degree Bachelor

Modality On-campus

About Program

Program Details

Admissions

Shaw University offers the bachelor of science degrees in business administration with concentrations in accounting or management. The degrees are designed to prepare students for the workforce in related business fields or to continue their studies in graduate or professional school. Students acquire an in-depth knowledge of the discipline and develop and strengthen their analytical, cognitive, speaking and writing skills, as well as build awareness of and commitment to business and public values and ethics.

In-State Tuition: $59,532

Out of State Tuition: $59,532

Credits: 121

Completion: 48 months

GPA: 2.0

Bachelor of Arts in Visual and Performing Arts

Music/Vocal

Shaw University

Raleigh, North Carolina

Tuition $59,040

Degree Bachelor

Modality On-campus

About Program

Program Details

Admissions

Shaw University offers a bachelor of arts degree in visual and performing arts with a concentration in music. Our degree is designed for students to gain an opportunity to prepare, nurture and develop individual musicianship on a professional level of artistic accomplishment. The program strives to enhance the musical talents and abilities of its students in an effort to reach their highest potential. Students in the department can expect to learn the fundamentals of music, and graduate with the ability to link stylistic traits with given historical periods, analyze music and demonstrate appropriate musical performance. Music majors also gain real-world experience with performances across the country and around the world. Students will gain valuable skills and knowledge in music theory, music history, conducting and applied music study .

In-State Tuition: $59,040

Out of State Tuition: $59,040

Credits: 120

Completion: 48 months

GPA: 2.0

Letter of Recommendation: Check with University

Essay Required: Check with University

Test Required: Check with University

You're on your way!
